Summary: Shot a long time lapse session at 5 sec intervals. UFO appears on 6 consecutive photos
divs: Sighting DetailsI left my GoPro camera to shoot time-lapse session at 17:12 PM on 31st of March, 2013, to shoot at 5 second intervals. Camera was placed on a second floor window sill pointed almost directly towards northern sky above Hamilton, Ontario, Canada After image review later that same day, I noticed a bright flash of light in upper left corner on three consecutive images taken at 19:41:46, 19:41:51 and 19:41:56. Bright white point of light appeared to be moving in SE direction, while gaining altitude and changing direction to W in a curve Fourth and fifth image show the same object, but without intense light, with some sunset light reflecting off of its surface. Sixth image in a sequence, timestamped at 19:42:16 shows a bell shaped object.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around March 31st 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
